sermons.title: Testimonies from Asia Harvest 01
sermons.description: Episode 1: The Experiences of a Chinese Pastor in Prison [*] Chinese Judge Astounded by Christian's Love [*] Going the Extra Mile in Henan [*] The Obediance of Sister Chang [*] Sister Yuen of Shanghai [*] When God Would Not Let His Name Be Defamed [*] "We Just Prayed" Learn more at: http://www.asiaharvest.com

sermons.title: Testimonies from Asia Harvest 02
sermons.description: Episode 2: Radio Revival Among the Hmong in Laos - 1950s [*] Radio Revival Among the White Hmong in China - 1990s [*] The Titanic's Last Hero [*] David Livingstone - Far More Than Just an Explorer. Learn more at: http://www.asiaharvest.com

sermons.title: Testimonies from Asia Harvest 03
sermons.description: Episode 3: Saved for His Glory - A Testimony from the Himalayas [*] A Great Miracle in the Midst of India Disaster [*] Sister Li and the Earthquake. Learn more at: http://www.asiaharvest.com

sermons.title: Testimonies from Asia Harvest 04
sermons.description: Episode 4: Henan China - Testimonies from the House Churches: God's Wrath Leads Many to Repentance. [*] Nagaland, India: When Heaven Came Down (part 1). Learn more at: http://www.asiaharvest.com

sermons.title: Testimonies from Asia Harvest 05
sermons.description: Episode 5: Nagaland, India: When Heaven Came Down (part 2) [*] About Asia Harvest. Learn more at: http://www.asiaharvest.com
